EmailTemplate.subject: HeadStart - You’re doing really well- 4 weeks left!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
HeadStart login details:
Email Address {!Contact.Email}
NCS ID
{!Contact.NCS_ID__c}
PIN {!Contact.Login_Password__c}
HeadStart Website
You're doing really well...only 4 weeks left!
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Well done on completing {!HS_Activity__c.HS_Hours_Total__c} hours of volunteering! We hope you’re enjoying your volunteering and learning a range of transferable skills that will be useful during your interview.
4 weeks left to log 16 hours of volunteering!
Help us, help you by logging your hours regularly on the HeadStart website so that we can invite you to interview. Remember that the deadline for logging your hours is 18th September.
Any questions? Email the HeadStart team, check out our website or get in touch on facebook.
The HeadStart team
